View on GitHub

To connect using sftp, be in the local directory where the file is

sftp -oPort=60022 user@sftpserver.com

sftp commands

pwd # remote pwd lpwd # local pwd ls # remote ls lls # local ls get # remote filename to local pwd put # local filename to remote location lcd # local cd cd # remote cd
